name: Waco Flight Training
about: Waco Flight Training is a dedicated flight school committed to providing comprehensive and personalized aviation education. With a team of 2 full-time and 3-4 part-time instructors, we ensure a tailored learning experience for each student. Our flexible scheduling allows students to fly frequently while accommodating their life schedules. We recommend budgeting between $14,500 and $15,500 for the Private Pilot Certificate, with total costs for all single-engine ratings under $90,000. We operate with a detailed in-house syllabus and Standard Operating Procedure to ensure effectiveness and efficacy in our training programs. Payment options include cash, check, and major credit cards, with discounts available for block funding. Our mission is strictly focused on flight training, and we prioritize the safety and success of our students. At Waco Flight Training, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Time Building Programs
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
Private Pilot
Instrument"]
